tags.name: Organization applications
tags.description:
Manage organization - application relationships. An application can be associated with one or more organizations in order to get access to the organization resources.

Currently, only machine-to-machine applications can be associated with organizations.

get.description: Get applications associated with the organization.

post.description: Add an application to the organization.

422.description: The application could not be added. Some of the applications may not exist.

put.description: Replace all applications associated with the organization with the given data.

applicationIds.description: An array of application IDs to replace existing applications.

422.description: The applications could not be replaced. Some of the applications may not exist.

delete.description: Remove an application from the organization.

204.description: The application was removed from the organization successfully.

post.summary: Assign roles to applications in an organization
post.description: Assign roles to applications in the specified organization.

applicationIds.description: An array of application IDs to assign roles to.

organizationRoleIds.description: An array of organization role IDs to assign to the applications.

201.description: Roles were assigned to the applications successfully.

422.description: At least one of the IDs provided is not valid. For example, the organization ID, application ID, or organization role ID does not exist; the application is not a member of the organization; or the role type is not assignable to the application.

get.description: Get roles associated with the application in the organization.

post.description: Add a role to the application in the organization.

422.description: The role could not be added. Some of the roles may not exist.

put.description: Replace all roles associated with the application in the organization with the given data.

organizationRoleIds.description: An array of role IDs to replace existing roles.

422.description: The roles could not be replaced. Some of the roles may not exist.

delete.description: Remove a role from the application in the organization.

204.description: The role was removed from the application in the organization successfully.

422.description: The application is not associated with the organization.

404.description: Cannot find the record to delete.
